attributes.action: publish the habitable building and land surface area in Home Information Packs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today it is very difficult for property buyers to estimate the fundamental value of a property or compare like for like values.

Greater transparency in the market would help home buyers make difficult decisions when purchasing their homes.

Home Information Packs should include:

(1) The surface area of the land on which the building is constructed

(2) The habitable surface area of the building
